about_the_game:
The official "Best Of" soundtrack contains every musical piece in TFH mastered to a traditional album format.

Every time we add new music to the game, we'll expand this album for no additional charge!

100% of proceeds from soundtrack sales (after platform fees) go directly to the musicians Stuart Ferguson and Whitetail. Thanks for your support, and enjoy!
